attributes.action: not override the competition commission for the HBOS/LTSB deal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The general public do not gain from this anti-competative deal. Placing 30% of mortgages and savings into one organization is not good for the public or the market and will create a monolith that is surely "too big to fail" when that organization succumbs to the inherent problems in the financial markets.
